name: BloodDome Classic
description:
Available for the first time on Personal Computers- experience the arcade shooter that started it all!

  • Kill or be killed against hordes of enemies using only your trusty pistol!
  • Earn upgrades to create unique builds and survive the BloodDome!
  • Fight for high scores on the online leaderboards!
  • Drown in nostalgia in Classic or try Remaster mode to experience the retro-futuristic arena with new controls and updated music!
